params.name: world_size
params.description: The number of processes used in the distributed training.

params.name: num_samples
params.description: The number of samples in our dataset.

params.name: make_multiple_of
params.description: If passed, the class assumes the datasets passed to each process are made to be a multiple of this argument(by adding samples).

params.name: padding_index
params.description: The padding index to use if the arrays dont all have the same sequence length.
